Description.Name: Sample hardware abstraction for USI MT3620 BT EVB
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This file defines the mapping from the USI MT3620 Bluetooth (BT) Evaluation Board (EVB) to the
// 'sample hardware' abstraction used by the samples at https://github.com/Azure/azure-sphere-samples.
// Some peripherals are on-board on the USI MT3620 BT EVB, while other peripherals must be attached externally if needed.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_BUTTON_1
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external button using J32, pin 13.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_BUTTON_2
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external button using J32, pin 14.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external LED using J32, pin 9.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_RED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external red LED using J32, pin 10.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_GREEN
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external green LED using J32, pin 11.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_BLUE
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external blue LED using J32, pin 12.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect J32 pin 2 (RX) to J32 pin 3 (TX).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external LSM6DS3 to I2C using J33, pin 15 (SDA) and pin 10 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: Connect external LSM6DS3 to SPI using J33, pin 7 (MISO), pin 5 (SCLK), pin 8 (CSA), pin 6 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI_CS
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SPI Chip Select (CS) value "A". This is not a peripheral identifier, and so has no meaning in an app manifest.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_RESET
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: BT_nRST (RESET) signal on nRF52810.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_DFU
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: BT_FW_EN (DFU) signal on nRF52810.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 USI BT EVB: UART on nRF52810.
